entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'the real Harry' by Mad-Eye. He is being protected and moved around by the Aurors.

entities.name: Mad-Eye
entities.description: An experienced Auror who has been tracking Voldemort's followers. He expects Harry to be with the toughest and most skilled Aurors.

entities.name: Tonks
entities.description: A sniffer who is part of the group protecting Harry. She mentions that Mad-Eye expected Harry to be with the toughest and most skilled Aurors.

entities.name: Fleur
entities.description: A member of the group who suspects that someone let slip the date of their plan to an outsider.

entities.name: Kingsley
entities.description: An Auror who was chased by Voldemort's followers.

entities.name: Mundungus
entities.description: A person who gave away the location of Mad-Eye and Kingsley to Voldemort's followers.

entities.name: Voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also referred to as 'You-Know-Who'.

entities.name: Hagrid
entities.description: A half-giant who has risked his life to save Harry's. He is trusted and loved by Harry.

relationships.description: Fleur suspects that someone let slip the date of their plan to an outsider, implying that Voldemort's followers might have been informed by this person.
Mad-Eye expects Harry to be with the toughest and most skilled Aurors.
Tonks mentions that Mad-Eye expected Harry to be with the toughest and most skilled Aurors.
Fleur glares at Hagrid, implying that she suspects him of being careless and letting slip the date of their plan.
